text: As a visual artist, my work revolves around the intersection of digital imagery and motion, exploring the possibilities of video and animation. Using software as my canvas, I craft experiences that tell stories through movement, color, and texture.

With a passion for art and technology, I enjoy working across digital platforms, experimenting with tools, and seeking ways to translate ideas into visual narratives. My goal is to inspire, provoke thought, and offer viewers a unique perspective through the lens of motion and design.
